                                                                        <archetype_id>
                                                                            <value>openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.medication_item.v1</value>
                                                                        </archetype_id>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0000">
                                                                            <items id="description">Records details of a medication product, dosage and administration directions, for use within medication recommendation, order, administration and dispensation records.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Medication item</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0001">
                                                                            <items id="comment">e.g.Citalopram tab 20mg, "Trimethoprim"</items>
                                                                            <items id="description">Mandatory medication name coded using a SNOMED CT/dm+d term where possible, allowing plain text for historical/patient reported items , extemporaneous preparations or those not registered in dm+d.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Medication name</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0002">
                                                                            <items id="comment">e.g. "Oral", "Intraocular"</items>
                                                                            <items id="description">Optional medication route, using SNOMED CT terms where possible. Not generally applicable to product-based medication. Should not be used to specify a specific administration site, for which a separate archetype is used e.g. The Route is 'intraocular' the Site may be 'Left eye'.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Route</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0003">
                                                                            <items id="comment">e.g. I tablet at night or 20mg at 10pm
This is the form of dosage direction text normally available from UK GP systems.</items>
                                                                            <items id="description">A single plain text phrase describing the entire medication dosage and administration directions, including dose quantity and medication frequency.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Dose directions description</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0004">
                                                                            <items id="comment">e.g. Dispense weekly</items>
                                                                            <items id="description">Multiple plain text to record complex dispensing arrangements, particularly for Controlled Drug instalment dispensing.  This is carried as a specific element in addition to 'Additional instructions' to align with legacy GP system behaviour.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Dispensing instruction</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0005">
                                                                            <items id="comment">e.g. Omit morning dose on day of procedure, "for pain or fever"</items>
                                                                            <items id="description">Additional multiple dosage or administration instructions as plain text. This may include guidance to the prescriber, patient or person administering the medication.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Additional instruction</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0020">
                                                                            <items id="comment">e.g. "30 mg" or "2 tabs".
UK Secondary care clinicians and systems normally minimally structure their dose directions, separating Dose amount and Dose timing (often referred to as Dose and Frequency). This format is not normally used in GP systems.</items>
                                                                            <items id="description">A plain text description of medication single dose amount, as described in the AoMRC medication headings.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Dose amount description</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0021">
                                                                            <items id="comment">e.g. "Twice a day", "At 8am 2pm and 10pm".
UK Secondary care clinicians and systems normally minimally structure their dose directions, separating Dose amount and Dose timing (often referred to as Dose and Frequency). This format is not normally used in GP systems.</items>
                                                                            <items id="description">A plain text description of medication dose frequency,  as described in the AoMRC medication headings.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Dose timing description</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0022">
                                                                            <items id="comment">e.g. "Modified Release Capsules"</items>
                                                                            <items id="description">Form of the medicinal substance e.g capsules, tablets, liquid. Not normally required unless a specific form has been requested by the prescriber.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Form</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0026">
                                                                            <items id="description">The total daily dose of this medication.  This is helpful for estimating optimal adherance to dosing guidance. It may be computed from product/dose strength and frequency or entered manually.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Total daily dose quantity</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0027">
                                                                            <items id="comment">Intended for general advice for the medication course as a whole, as might be carried in a Patient Information Leaflet (PIL) and not for specific dosage instructions. In practice the use of this element is likely to overlap with information recorded in the 'Additional instruction' element.</items>
                                                                            <items id="description">Multiple plain text instructions intended for patient or carer. This is carried as a specific element in addition to 'Additional instructions' to align with legacy GP system behaviour.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Patient advice</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0028">
                                                                            <items id="description">Additional comment or recommendation about the medication course e.g. 'Patient named supply', 'unlicensed medication', 'Foreign brand' or monitoring recommendations.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Comment / recommendation</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0029">
                                                                            <items id="comment">e.g. "Left eye"</items>
                                                                            <items id="description">The anatomical site at which the medication is to be administered.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Site</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0030">
                                                                            <items id="description">The technique or method by which the medication is to be administered.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Method</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0033">
                                                                            <items id="comment">e.g. "20-30mg ^4/6h prn [180mg /24h]" = 20 to 30 mgs, up to 4-6 hourly as required. Maximum 180mg in 24 hours. The 'as required reason' e.g 'for pain' should be carried in the Additional Instruction element. Note that this is generally a symptom and is not the same as the Indication which will usually describe a diagnosis or condition.
Where supported, this would generally be used to exchange  dosage information between systems, while Structured dose directions are likely to be used only within openEHR-based systems.</items>
                                                                            <items id="description">A parsable 'dose syntax' which carries dose strength, dose timing, dose duration and maximum dose information.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Parsable dose directions</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0037">
                                                                            <items id="comment">e.g. "for 7 days", "Continue indefinitely".
"Continue indefinitely", and "Do not discontinue" are normally applied to medication discharge orders and recommendations.</items>
                                                                            <items id="description">The duration of a single dose direction. Where multiple dose directions are required for a course of medication e.g for a tapering or increasing dose, the duration refers to the duration of a single direction, not the whole course.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Dose direction duration</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0039">
                                                                            <items id="description">The date and/or time that the medication course should begin.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Start datetime</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0040">
                                                                            <items id="description">The date and/or time that the medication course should finish.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">End datetime</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0042">
                                                                            <items id="description">The medication should be continued indefinitely.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Continue indefinitely</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0043">
                                                                            <items id="description">The medication should be continued indefinitely and the prescriber highly recommends that it should never be discontinued. This is an AoMRC Clinical Headings recommendation.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Do not discontinue</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0044">
                                                                            <items id="comment">Structural representations (class models) of dose strength and timing can be extremely complex, particularly in secondary care systems. Using a slot here allows for some variation in the models that are used internally within systems.</items>
                                                                            <items id="description">A slot containing a structural, computable representation of dose strength / timing and maximum dose.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Structured dose</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0045">
                                                                            <items id="comment">Structured dose directions will normally be used within openEHR systems rather than in cross-system communication but may be helpful where legacy systems expose some structured data e.g Direction duration</items>
                                                                            <items id="description">A structural representation of the elements carried by the dose syntax in 'Parsable dose strength/timing' i.e. dose strength, dose timing, dose duration and maximum dose.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Structured dose direction</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0046">
                                                                            <items id="description">Details of the overall course of medication.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Course details</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0047">
                                                                            <items id="comment">e.g. "Angina". The Indication generally describes a condition or diagnosis .</items>
                                                                            <items id="description">The clinical indication or reason for ordering the medication. Coded terms are preferable.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Indication</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0048">
                                                                            <items id="description">A link to the record which contains the Indication for this medication order.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Link to Indication record</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0049">
                                                                            <items id="description">The status of this prescription in an ambulatory (outpatient/GP/community) context.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Course status</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0050">
                                                                            <items id="description">This an active medication.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Active</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0051">
                                                                            <items id="description">This is a medication that has been issued. dispensed or administered but has now been discontinued.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Discontinued</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0052">
                                                                            <items id="description">A medication which was ordered or authorised but has been cancelled prior to being issued, dispensed or adiminstered.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Never active</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0053">
                                                                            <items id="description">The medication course has been completed.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Completed</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                        <term_definitions code="at0054">
                                                                            <items id="description">This medication order has been superseded by another.</items>
                                                                            <items id="text">Obsolete</items>
                                                                        </term_definitions>
                                                                    </children>

                                                                        </interval>
                                                                    </cardinality>
                                                                </attributes>
                                                            </children>

                                                                                <archetype_id>
                                                                                    <value>openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.medication_event.v1</value>
                                                                                </archetype_id>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0000">
                                                                                    <items id="description">Records an event in the supply of the medication to the patient, supply covering repeat authorisation, prescription issue, administration and dispensing of the medication.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Medication event</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0004">
                                                                                    <items id="comment">e.g."ACBS" or Private
Assume "Standard" as default </items>
                                                                                    <items id="description">A coded value describing the kind of 'contract' in place under which the medication was supplied. Multiple endorsements / contracts are allowed.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Prescription endorsement</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0033">
                                                                                    <items id="description">Details of authorisation of a medication.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Authorisation</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0034">
                                                                                    <items id="comment">Example: 12
Source: GP systems</items>
                                                                                    <items id="description">The number of repeat issues authorised. A figure of zero implies that this is a single 'acute' prescription.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Repeat issues authorised</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0035">
                                                                                    <items id="comment">Example: 01-Dec-2012
Source GP2GP</items>
                                                                                    <items id="description">The date after which the authorisation will have expired.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Authorisation expiry date</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0036">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The contract or scheme which applies to this medication.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Prescribing method</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0037">
                                                                                    <items id="description">Details of a single issue of an acute or repeat medication prescription.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Prescription issue</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0038">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The number of repeats issued since the last authorisation.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Number of repeats issued</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0039">
                                                                                    <items id="description">A link or refernece to the record where a repeat medication was originally authorised.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Link to original authorisation</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0040">
                                                                                    <items id="description">A link or reference to the record where the repeat medication was last authorised.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Link to authorisation record</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0051">
                                                                                    <items id="comment">e.g 'SWG-3536789'</items>
                                                                                    <items id="description">The batch number, in plain text, of the medication administered.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Batch number</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0052">
                                                                                    <items id="comment">e.g. May 2013</items>
                                                                                    <items id="description">The expiration date of the medication administered. this may be a whole or partial date.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Expiry date</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0057">
                                                                                    <items id="description">Details of medication dispensing.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Dispensing</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0058">
                                                                                    <items id="description">Details of one or more dispensing contract endorsements.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Dispensing endorsement</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0061">
                                                                                    <items id="description">Contraceptive endorsed product.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Contraceptive</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0062">
                                                                                    <items id="description">SLS endorsed product included in Part XVIIIB of the Drug Tariff.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">SLS (Schedule 2)</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0063">
                                                                                    <items id="description">ACBS endorsed product  included in Part XV (Borderline Substances) of the Drug Tariff. May not be prescribed privately.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">ACBS</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0064">
                                                                                    <items id="description">Assorted flavours endorsed product.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Assorted flavours</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0065">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The medication was supplied privately.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Private</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0066">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The medication can only be supplied by a hospital.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Hospital only</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0077">
                                                                                    <items id="description">NHS Scotland Minor Ailments Service (MAS).</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">NHS Scotland Minor Ailments Service (MAS)</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0078">
                                                                                    <items id="description">NHS SCotland Acute Medication Service (AMS).</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">NHS Scotland Acute Medication Service (AMS)</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0079">
                                                                                    <items id="description">NHS Scotland Chronic Medication Service (CMS).</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">NHS Scotland Chronic Medication Service (CMS)</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0080">
                                                                                    <items id="description">NHS Scotland Unscheduled Care (CPUS).</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">NHS Scotland Unscheduled Care (CPUS)</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0081">
                                                                                    <items id="description">NHS England  Electronic Prescription Service 1 (EPS1).</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">NHS England  Electronic Prescription Service 1 (EPS1)</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0082">
                                                                                    <items id="description">NHS England  Electronic Prescription Service 2 (EPS2).</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">NHS England  Electronic Prescription Service 2 (EPS2)</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0083">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The number of days for which this issue was supplied.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Duration of issue</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0085">
                                                                                    <items id="comment">Example: 28 days
Source: GP systems</items>
                                                                                    <items id="description">The minimum period advised between issues.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Minimum period between issues</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0086">
                                                                                    <items id="comment">Example: 56 days
Source: GP systems</items>
                                                                                    <items id="description">The maximum period advised between issues.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Maximum period between issues</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0087">
                                                                                    <items id="description">GP repeat prescribing service.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Repeat prescription</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0088">
                                                                                    <items id="description">Repeat issues are managed by the dispenser.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Repeat dispensing</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0089">
                                                                                    <items id="description">A link or reference to the record  representing the medication issue.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Link to issue</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0099">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The quantity of medication supplied i.e quantity issued, quantity authorised, quantity dispensed or quantity administered, depending on the event concerned.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Quantity supplied</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0113">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The agency responsible for authorising or issuing the medication.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Prescribing agency</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0114">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The medication was issued or authorised by the general practice.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Registered GP practice</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0115">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The medication was authorised or issued outside the patient's registered general practice. The exact agency is unknown.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Outside</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0116">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The patient  is self--prescribing i.e. Over-the-counter prescribing.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Over the counter (OTC)</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0117">
                                                                                    <items id="description">A hospital department is responsible for the medication.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Outside - Hospital</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0118">
                                                                                    <items id="description">A health carer in another practice is responsible for the medication.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Outside - Other GP practice</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0121">
                                                                                    <items id="description">Details related to the authorisation or issue of the medication.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Prescription supply</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0122">
                                                                                    <items id="description">Details relevant to discontinuation of the medication.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Discontinutation</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0124">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The reason that administration of a medication was withheld.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Reason withheld</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0125">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The reason why a medication was discontinued.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Reason discontinued</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0126">
                                                                                    <items id="description">A link to a record which contains the reason why the medication was withheld.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Link to reason withheld</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0127">
                                                                                    <items id="description">Details relevant to withholding administration of the medication.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Administration withheld</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0128">
                                                                                    <items id="description">A link to a record which contains the reason why the medication was discontinued.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Link to reason discontinued</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0129">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The type of prescription authorised or issued.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Prescription type</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0130">
                                                                                    <items id="description">A single issue prescription.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Acute prescription</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0131">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The prescription was issued or authorised by an Out of Hours service.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Outside - Out of Hours service</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0132">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The prescription was issued solely on a paper prescription.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Printed</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0133">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The prescription was issued on a handwritten prescription.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Handwritten</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0135">
                                                                                    <items id="description">Details of the product supplied.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Product</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0136">
                                                                                    <items id="description">Any additional comments regarding thos medication event.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Comment</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0137">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The medication was marked as issued without a printed prescription or electronic token being created.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Issued without script</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0138">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The prescription was issued elctronically.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Electronic</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0139">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The prescription was issued via a repeat dispensing arrangement.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Repeat dispensed</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0140">
                                                                                    <items id="description">The prescription was dispensed.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Dispensed</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                                <term_definitions code="at0141">
                                                                                    <items id="description">Product pack is included in Part XVIIIA of the Drug Tariff  i.e. Schedule 1.</items>
                                                                                    <items id="text">Schedule 1 product</items>
                                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                            </children>

                                                                <archetype_id>
                                                                    <value>openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.medication_event_summary.v1</value>
                                                                </archetype_id>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0000">
                                                                    <items id="description">Summary of key medication events and dates, normally carried within a Medication Statement Entry.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Medication event summary</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0038">
                                                                    <items id="description">Further detail about the medication event.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Medication event detail</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0047">
                                                                    <items id="description">A date relating to a specific medication event during the course of a medication. Generally only exposed when the medication order archetype is being used in 'summary' mode.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Event date</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0059">
                                                                    <items id="description">The date at which the medication was first issued. 'Issued' refers to the prescription 'token' electronic or paper which authorises supply of a medication.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date first prescription issued</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0060">
                                                                    <items id="description">The date at which the medication prescription was last issued. This refers to the prescription 'token' electronic or paper which authorises supply of a medication.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date last prescription issued</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0061">
                                                                    <items id="description">The date at which the medication was first authorised.For a repeat prescription, authorisation refers to the creation of the repeat prescription 'master' which is followed by the production of one or more prescription issues.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date first authorised</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0062">
                                                                    <items id="description">The data at which the medication was last authorised.The date at which the medication was first authorised.For a repeat prescription, authorisation refers to the creation of the repeat prescription 'master' which is followed by the production of one or more prescription issues. Authorisation is generally only given for a limited period or limited number of issues, after which re-authorisation is required.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date last authorised</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0063">
                                                                    <items id="description">The date at which the medicaton was first physically dispensed.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date first dispensed</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0064">
                                                                    <items id="description">The date at which the medication was last dispensed.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date last dispensed</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0065">
                                                                    <items id="description">The date at which the medication was first administered to the patient.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date first administered</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0066">
                                                                    <items id="description">The date at which the medication was last administered.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date last administered</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0067">
                                                                    <items id="description">The data at which the medication course was first ordered or recommended.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date ordered/recommended</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0070">
                                                                    <items id="description">Summary of a medication event. Often this will be simply one or more key dates but further event detail may be required in some circumstances.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Medication event</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0071">
                                                                    <items id="description">A link to the original record of the medication event.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Link to event record</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0072">
                                                                    <items id="description">The date at which the medication was discontinued.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date discontinued</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0073">
                                                                    <items id="description">The date at which the medication was authorised or re-authorised.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date authorised</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0074">
                                                                    <items id="description">The date at which a medication prescription was issued i.e the physical or electronic prescription token was created.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date prescription issued</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0075">
                                                                    <items id="description">The date at which a medication was dispensed.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date dispensed</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0076">
                                                                    <items id="description">The date at which a medication was administered.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date administered</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0077">
                                                                    <items id="description">The data at which administration of a medication was withheld or suspended.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date administration withheld</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0078">
                                                                    <items id="description">The date at which the medication order was reviewed.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date reviewed</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                                <term_definitions code="at0079">
                                                                    <items id="description">The date at which the medication order was last reviewed.</items>
                                                                    <items id="text">Date last reviewed</items>
                                                                </term_definitions>
                                                            </children>

                                                                <is_ordered>false</is_ordered>
                                                                <is_unique>false</is_unique>

                                                                    <lower_included>true</lower_included>

                                                                    <upper_unbounded>true</upper_unbounded>
                                                                    <lower>0</lower>
                                                                </interval>
                                                            </cardinality>
                                                        </attributes>
                                                    </children>
                                                </attributes>
                                                <archetype_id>
                                                    <value>openEHR-EHR-INSTRUCTION.medication_order_uk.v1</value>
                                                </archetype_id>
                                                <term_definitions code="at0000">
                                                    <items id="description">Record of the order or recommendation of a single medication item.</items>
